channel.title: Prerequisites on Presidium
channel.description: Recent content in Prerequisites on Presidium

item.title: Prerequisites
item.description: The following tools are required to use Presidium: Install Homebrew /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)" Add the Presidium Tap brew tap SPANDigital/homebrew-tap git@github.com:SPANDigital/homebrew-tap.git Install Presidium brew install presidium
